casebody.data:
Toledo Public Schools Board of Education, Appellee, v. Lucas County Board of Revision et al., Appellees; Regina Manor, L.L.C., et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Toledo Pub. Schools Bd. of Edn. v. Lucas Cty. Bd. of Revision, 125 Ohio St.3d 466, 2010-Ohio-2427.]

(No. 2009-2102 Submitted May 26, 2010 Decided June 3, 2010.) Spengler Nathanson, P.L.L., Michael W. Bragg, and Teresa L. Grigsby, for appellee Toledo Public Schools Board of Education. Douglas A. Wilkins, for appellants.

{If 1} The decision of the Board of Tax Appeals is reversed on the authority of Toledo Pub. Schools Bd. of Edn. v. Lucas Cty. Bd. of Revision, 124 Ohio St.3d 490, 2010-Ohio-253, 924 N.E.2d 345, and the cause is remanded to the Board of Tax Appeals for further proceedings.

Brown, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
